title: Segment an Email List for a Targeted Send
description: An email marketer wants to send a promotional email to a specific segment of their audience: customers who have purchased in the last 60 days but have not opened the last two emails.

tasks.description: Create a list of all customers who made a purchase in the last 60 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates the initial list of recent purchasers.

tasks.description: Create a second list of all customers who did not open the last two email campaigns.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates the list of unengaged users.

tasks.description: Find the intersection of the two lists to create the final target segment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates the final, highly-targeted segment of users.
